name: Remoraid
description: It squirts water forcefully from its mouth to shoot down flying prey.

abilities.name: Hustle
abilities.effect: This Pokémon's physical moves do 1.5× as much regular damage, but have 0.8× their usual accuracy.  Special moves are unaffected.  Moves that do set damage, such as seismic toss, have their accuracy affected, but not their damage.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, higher-levelled Pokémon have their encounter rate increased.

abilities.name: Sniper
abilities.effect: This Pokémon inflicts triple damage with critical hits, rather than the usual double damage.
abilities.description: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.

abilities.name: Moody
abilities.effect: After each turn, one of this Pokémon's stats at random rises two stages, and another falls one stage.  If a stat is already at 6 or -6 stages, it will not be chosen to be increased or decreased, respectively.
abilities.description: Raises one stat and lowers another.
